statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_data_access_audit WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE id = 100 AND user_id = 50
DELETE FROM user_audit_log WHERE action = 'DELETE' AND user_id = 75
DELETE FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 123 AND access_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_access WHERE user_id = 123 AND access_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-05-01 12:30:00' AND data LIKE '%important%'
DELETE FROM UserAccessLogs WHERE log_id = 10 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM Users WHERE user_id = 5 OR email = 'example@example.com';
DELETE FROM user_data_audit WHERE user_id = 100 AND action = 'login';
